nodes.text: The Farfalla system was located in the Indra-su-Mar sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. It shared its name with the half-Bothan Jedi Lord Valenthyne Farfalla.

The Farfalla system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square P-12. Fry has stated that the star systems listed in the book's Appendix section are named after the most prominent planets or celestial bodies located in those systems. Furthermore, he has explicitly confirmed his intention for the Farfalla system to have contained a planet of the same name, which would have served as the homeworld of the half-Bothans.
